__e: A man came to me and loved me and made this child.
I can't say it'll go away soon... but I am sure that if your son... if he could talk to you right now... he would want you to know that you are loved and needed... in this house.
My dad never liked me, and my mom never trusted me.
You take me. I want you to know what it's like to lose the only thing that you ever loved in your life.
What you didn't understand and what I've decided to tell you is that I love you, but I know that for you to love me, I should be dead.
His eyes are opened at last and he knows now that your mother is the only woman he's ever loved in his whole life.
I did anything I could to keep a man in my life so I'd feel loved just for a while.
Rusty, I, I always thought you were poor.
I came here because it might be my last chance to be seen for who I really am!
I'm sorry. I loved you the moment I saw you.
I loved you from the moment I saw you on the "L"?
I just know that I've loved you since the first time I saw you.
And he used to love me too, but then I was really mean to him... and now we'll never know what could have been.
He says... He says I'm not the woman he loved but another woman in her shape.
I mean, yeah, I think he liked me a lot, but, uh, no, not even close.
I mean, yes, Rachel is my good friend. And I have loved her in the past... but now, she is just my wife.
I just know I want to be beautiful so I can be loved by someone like you.
After my mother died, I just... I couldn't even imagine that I could feel loved so unconditionally, by someone who wasn't my family.
